Design Rule ChecksÂ¶

How to organize this?

We could have one page per layer. But then what about stuff like vias that involve multiple layers? Perhaps they get their own pages too.

Alternatively we could do one page per type of rule (width, spacing, inclusion, etc.)

  • rules
    • Width
    • Spacing
    • Area
    • Overlap
    • Inclusion
    • Exclusion
